modName: Platinum Nord Plate with polar fox fur
summary: Retexture of Nord Plate Chain mail for male and female character.
descriptionHtml:
I just retex Nord Plate and change fur to polar fox which better meets woman character. 

UPDATE:
Male Armor added. :)
Edited Normal Maps for better look of fur.

INSTALL:
Just copy content of compressed file to ...\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data

It STILL replaces original texture, so both characters have it!!!

PERMISSION:
It\'s free to use/edit, just send me PM with link to your work. I like to see your work.

CREDITS:
Many thanks to kaburka for FOMM used to export textures from game.
http://www.newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=36901

Many thanks to Ninja-Rio for chainmail texture.
http://ninja-ryo.deviantart.com/art/PS6-PATTERNS-Chainmail-194429061
author: RhinoM
